law.catch_line: Definition of "instructional materials" for KRS 156.400 to 156.476.
law.text: For purposes of KRS 156.400 to 156.476, unless the context requires otherwise, "instructional materials" means tools used to assist in student learning, as defined in administrative regulations promulgated by the Kentucky Board of Education.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 362, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 266, sec. 1, effective July 14, 1992.
